item.title: HACK ROBOY - The ultimate robotics hackathon
item.description: This weekend I had a fun at awesome Hack Roboy hackathon organized by Roboy team. They created nice robot and it was second event. I’ve never try to programming robots, so there was new and remarkable experience for me. Friday evening we started brainstorming ideas (or bearstorming, it is München, baby). The most important thing - we were not alone. Roboy team helped to understand capabilities and push to right way.
